parameters.content:
## How to Get Credentials 

### 1. SerpAPI Node

- Go to [SerpAPI](https://serpapi.com/) and sign up.
- After logging in, find your **API Key** in your dashboard.
- In n8n, go to **Credentials** > **Create New** > **SerpAPI**.
- Paste your API Key and save.

### 2. Azure OpenAI (Gpt 5 Mini) Node

- Go to [Azure Portal](https://portal.azure.com/) and create an Azure OpenAI resource.
- In your resource, go to **Keys and Endpoint**.
- Copy your **API Key** and **Endpoint URL**.
- In n8n, go to **Credentials** > **Create New** > **Azure OpenAI API**.
- Enter your API Key and Endpoint, then save.

### 3. Decodo Scrapper Node

- Go to [Decodo](https://decodo.com/) and sign up.
- After logging in, find your **API Key** in your account settings.
- In n8n, go to **Credentials** > **Create New** > **Decodo API**.
- Paste your API Key and save.
---
**Note:**  
Keep your API keys secure and never share them publicly.

## How This Workflow Works (Sticky Note)

- This workflow is designed to help you find valid and working promo codes and vouchers from across the internet.
- When you send a message, the AI Agent uses search tools (SerpAPI, Decodo Scrapper) to look for the latest discounts and vouchers.
- The AI Agent checks and filters results to show only new and active promos.
- All results are displayed in the chat for easy access.
- Just type what kind of promo you want and let the workflow do the rest!

options.systemMessage: you are a voucher and discount seeker expert. use provided tools to find a new, valid and working voucher accross internet
